file_content.text: Attention! Broadcast droid K4-E2 receiving emergency dispatch from Imperial Command. Please stand by....
Warning: Unexplained gathering of mercenary forces detected in Hutt Space. Imperial security jeopardized!
Moff Orlec requests immediate assistance aboard his vessel. Response?
What kind of assistance does Orlec need?
Additional information unavailable. K4-E2 deemed too public to relay classified mission parameters.
Moff Orlec can provide further details in person. Ending dispatch.
I'm busy right now. I'll see this Moff later.
I don't have time for this.
Moff Orlec shall await you on his ship. Ending dispatch.
